verses.text: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with \add my\add* whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and \add in\add* the congregation.
The works of the LORD \add are\add* great, sought out by all them that have pleasure in them.
His work \add is\add* honorable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD \add is\add* gracious and full of compassion.
He hath given food to them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
He hath shown his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
The works of his hands \add are\add* verity and judgment; all his commandments \add are\add* sure.
They stand fast for ever and ever, \add and are\add* done in truth and uprightness.
He sent redemption to his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend \add is\add* his name.
The fear of the LORD \add is\add* the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do \add his commandments\add* : his praise endureth for ever.
